name: activity6
description: In this activity, you will build a simple command line application that accepts user input and writes it to a `.json` file.    ## Instructions   * Initialize your repository and install the `inquirer` dependency.       * Is there another dependency you will need?    * Prompt your user with the following questions:       * "What is your name?"       * "What languages do you know?"       * What is your preferred method of communciation?"   * Then write the user response to a file.    ## Hint(s)   * You will need to use `JSON.stringify()`.   * You will need to consult the `inquirer` documentation on how to prompt users for checkboxes and lists.   ## Bonus   * How would you format your JSON?   * Can you generate the name of your user file from their input?
author: choyo
